% This is template used by gamerec Python package to save games in SQLite database
% Following tags will have separate fields in database

Event
Site
Date
EventDate
Round
Board
White
Black
WhiteElo
BlackElo
WhiteTitle
BlackTitle
TimeControl
Result

% Other tags will be saved in common field: xxx
% as string in format: Tag1=Value1|Tag2=Value2|...
